Name: Login with valid credentials
Description: Test user can login with correct username and password
Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to login page
Step 2: Enter valid username
Step 3: Enter valid password
Step 4: Click login button
Expected: User is successfully logged in

Name: Login with invalid password
Description: Test error message appears with wrong password
Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to login page
Step 2: Enter valid username
Step 3: Enter invalid password
Step 4: Click login button
Expected: Error message 'Invalid credentials' is displayed

Name: Logout functionality
Steps:
Step 1: Login to application
Step 2: Click logout button
Expected: User is redirected to login page

Name: Password reset request
Description: Test password reset email is sent
Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to login page
Step 2: Click 'Forgot Password' link
Step 3: Enter registered email
Step 4: Click submit
Expected: Success message and email sent

Name: Remember me checkbox
Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to login page
Step 2: Enter credentials
Step 3: Check 'Remember Me'
Step 4: Login and close browser
Step 5: Reopen browser
Expected: User remains logged in
